title: Lalpa kal tura min duhna hmun apiang chu
lyrics:
Lalpa, kal tura min duhna hmun apiang chu,
Tlang sang tak leh tuifawn vel kar pawh ni se;
I thu leh kraws mawia min thuam chuanin,
I hmangaihna thu hi ka hril zel ang.

Kal la, thawk tan thuai rawh, nite an ral zel e,
Kalvari tlanna mak hre lote hnenah chuan;
I rah chin apiang chu i ram a ni zel ang,
Chak tak leh huai takin awm phawt mai rawh.

Setan ral lian chu hlau lovin kal zel ang che,
Tawpna thlenga i hnena awm zel ka tiam e;
Thu ka pe che alawm, engmah hlau suh,
Chak tak leh huai takin awm phawt mai rawh.

Ka thutiam a danglamngai lo, a nghet fo thin,
Eng mah rengin a tibuai lo'ng che, ka tiam e,
I rah chin apiang chu ka pe ang che,
Chak tak leh huai takin awm phawt mai rawh.

Ka chhandamna Zion tlangah chuan rawn hruai la,
An tan hmun nuam leh hahchawlhna ka buatsaih e;
Chak tak leh huai takin hril zel ang che,
I lawmna lallukhum a mawi ngei ang.
